ModMetaData.name: Skylight Sunlight
ModMetaData.author: Malnormalulo
ModMetaData.description:
Simple compatibility patch to make Dubs Skylights work as expected with Sanguophages and VE's Phytokin.
Those are the ones I play with, but this will also work for most other mods which check whether a pawn is exposed to sunlight. Pretty much all of them use the same code.
Code available at: https://github.com/malnormalulo/rw-skylight-sunlight
